item.title: Automation with Zero Trust
item.description: PowerShell Code There are two PowerCLI commands that have become my best friends in a Zero Trust Environment. Invoke-VMScript - Use to run scripts on VMs. Copy-VMGuestFile - Use to copy files to/from VMs. In this example you can use Invoke-VMScript to run commands on a VM to install Trend Deep Security. All commands run with VM in a zero trust state. $VMName = 'VM Name' #Copy file to the VM $PSText = 'wget https://server01.
